subject: Football
Free Agents (Sports)
lead_paragraph: N.F.L. teams were required to cut their rosters to 53 players by 6 p.m. Saturday. The Giants did it one better, shedding enough players to leave only 52.
snippet: N.F.L. teams were required to cut their rosters to 53 players by 6 p.m. Saturday. The Giants did it one better, shedding enough players to leave only 52.
